task.summary: Default task
Multiple Updates include Session and Location Selection.
Cleaned Up Code to Location for System Wide operations.
Option to Specify the WO# when using or returning the Part to Inventory
Added Flash notification on Location Change.
Managing PO Payments
Added option to Edit POs associated to a PO Payment
Added Container Fluid to all
Basic UI and Persisting of Recording Qty Received Implemented. Verify button shows up on the main list of POs after the status is set to shipped on PO.
Added New Migration to create Stock Distribution table. And smaller changes to PO Controllers.
Added and updated Models for PO Item Distribution.
General Logic on Distribution of Stock Evenly.
Updated UI for Stock Distribution.
Updated UI for Stock Distribution for Response from Server and Added Seq Id to Locations.
Added Toastr Notification to display the Location a PArt is going when scanned for PO verify.
Make Toastr Notifications with Proper Color.
Migration to make payment Details in Po Payment Nullable.
Added HTML Constraints on WO# for being only positive and step to 1
Added logic to remove sales and stock level in PI screen after it is finalized. As the data added no value to the end user when PI is at that stage.
Add Realtime updating Summary to PO Verify process.
Restrict Status Change in UI after shipment is Received.
Processing for Creating the Diff Records.
Complete PO Verification and Short Excess Report
Basic Scaffolding for Stock Distribution
Stock Distribution UI with ability to Edit items to be sent to Each Location.
Added Route Model Binding to PO Controller Functions.
Updated the Code and Strategy for Auto PO Generation
Added Sold All time to Part as Model Attribute Getter. And displayed it in Edit PO UI.
Updated Auto Generation Logic.

Updated Auto Generation Logic. Get all parts sold in past year. Need a minimum of 2 of these. Calculate average monthly sale of each, and order for 3 months + 10 %. Now check the current stock and other what is needed after substracting the needed from it.
Updated Auto Generation Logic.
Functionality to import and update just stock levels and part name.
Confirmation on Delete of Item in PO list Fixed.
Enabled the change of status on Finalizing of Shipment on order verification.
Auto Generated File. Missed in earlier commit.
Added Confirmation Dialogue before Deleting a PO
Updated Stock Import Code to be Exclusive. Delete Old rows and then create new one.
Updated Hard-Coded Location Codes in Script. Need to make it dynamic.
REmoved Dump and Die
Temp change default auto replenish suplier
Migration to Create Tables for Stock Transfer Order.
Added StockTransfer Number Generation Logic to Helper.
Migration to Create Tables for Stock Transfer Order.
Basic Controller to Display List of Stock Transfer with Relevant Routes
Stock Transfer UI and Stuff
Migration to Add Location Field to PO.
Added Relationship Defination functions to Models for Location in PO
Added Relationship Defination functions to Models for Location in PO
Selects S1 as Default Location for each PO. No UI to change this implemented yet. Would strictly be used for making the Stock transfer and Adding to Stock after receiving PO work logically.
Part Search Dropdown.
